category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEMCI0PMIViewDisplayNameColumnShownPref
preference.preference_description: Defines the list of properties columns displayed in Product Manufacturing Information (PMI) Management view in the Part Planner and Manufacturing Process Planner applications. Valid Values: in the format "ObjectTypeInternalName.PropertyInternalName", e.g. "BOMLine.bl_indented_title". The value for ObjectTypeInternalName can only be BOMLine or one of its derived types.
